renderingProperty.name: Rendering mode
renderingProperty.description: Map optimization for respective User Profile

renderingProperty.name: Show contour lines
renderingProperty.description: Select minimum zoom level to display in map if available. Separate contour file may be needed.

renderingProperty.name: OSM mapper assistant
renderingProperty.description: Show fixme and other features to help OSM mappers

renderingProperty.name: Hide polygons
renderingProperty.description: Make all areal land features on map transparent

renderingProperty.name: Show cycle routes
renderingProperty.description: Show cycle routes (*cn_networks) in bicycle mode

renderingProperty.name: Show MTB routes
renderingProperty.description: Show mountain bike routes (*cn_networks) in bicycle mode

renderingProperty.name: Hiking symbol overlay
renderingProperty.description: Render symbols of OSMC hiking traces

renderingProperty.name: Alpine hiking view
renderingProperty.description: Render paths according to SAC scale

renderingProperty.name: Current GPX color
renderingProperty.description: Color of the currently recording track

renderingProperty.name: Current GPX width
renderingProperty.description: Width of the currently recording track
